instructions: Go to Settings > General > Keyboard > Keyboards. Tap Add New Keyboard, then choose a keyboard.
While typing text, touch and hold the Next Keyboard Emoji key or the Switch Keyboard key . Tap the name of the keyboard you want to switch to.
Go to Settings > General > Keyboard. Tap Keyboards, select a keyboard, then choose a layout.

Go to Settings > Accessibility, then tap Side Button (on an iPhone with Face ID) or Home Button (on other iPhone models). Choose the speed required to double or triple-click. Choose how iPhone responds when you press and hold the side or Home button.
